ai-anya-e0501n5:1_0: and it is called “announcing” in the law of profitable states.
ai-anya-e0501n5:1_1: or whatever qualities arise together with a single consciousness of the mind, all together with the fact that has arisen, Sahajāpati, and because of arisen.
ai-anya-e0501n5:1_2: They are constantly repulsible for facing the heart and connecting each other with the site of the heart.
ai-anya-e0501n5:1_3: all the great elementals have been reborn in together by each other.
ai-anya-e0501n5:1_4: Their mind and body are produced by deeds. The mind is the arising of the similes of that deed, with the fading away of mind, and the mind-made body for him.
ai-anya-e0501n5:1_5: All of them have arisen in the names of the forms,

ai-anya-e0501n5:3_0: Just as the sun and moon, so long as the sun and moon, and as the sun rises and the world is,
ai-anya-e0501n5:3_1: Just as heavy the blazing light on a flame, and all the people look to the lamp, using the brilliant as his own body,
ai-anya-e0501n5:3_2: In the same way, this liable to arise is reborn in oneself. This is the arising of conditions that arises in oneself.
ai-anya-e0501n5:3_3: Herein, the sun and moon are as though with associated states, like the sun is the light of the sun and moon, like the sun and moon is the light of the world.
ai-anya-e0501n5:3_4: Likewise the sun and moon, as he was, the sun and moon, like a waning on the sun and moon, the sun, and the lights up the path of the gods, just as the sun and moon are unable to light.
ai-anya-e0501n5:3_5: The conclusion of the same births is finished.
